br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator

Class I18nMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.I18nMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message, java.io.Serializable

    public class I18nMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    In this Message implementation, the message is i18n'ed while the category is literal. The i18n is lazy.
    Since:
    3.1.3
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
